text: Which of the following would you use to control the layout of multiple UI elements in UI Toolkit?
feedbackCorrect: The USS (Unity Style Sheets) is used to control the layout and appearance of UI elements in UI Toolkit.
feedbackIncorrect: The USS (Unity Style Sheets) is used to control the layout and appearance of UI elements in UI Toolkit, not the VisualElement, UXML, or EventBase.
